Package controller

Class AllPatientController

java.lang.Object
controller.Controller
controller.AllPatientController
public class AllPatientController extends Controller
The AllPatientController contains the entire logic of the patient view. It determines which data is displayed and how to react to events.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    private class 
    AllPatientController.LockMarkDateFormatCell
    Formats lockDate Cell to the lockDate in Red or, if the lockDate is null, it clears the lockDate
